title: What are some examples of zero articles? - Quora

response.answer_text: 1. We use the zero article with names of continents, week-days, persons, months, countries and so on : Sunday is my favorite day of the week.Europe is known as the “old-continent”.Mike likes chocolate cakes a lot.July is the seventh month of the year.2. We use it in front of colors, sports/games, languages, meals : Red is my team’s color.Golf is an aristocratic game.French is the language of love.I never have time for breakfast.3. In front of nouns used in a general way : Girls like dresses and shoes.Kids like playing.Water boils at 100 degrees.Miracles happen.4. With abstract nouns or nouns which cannot be counted (gold,water, salt, sand) : Beauty is a relative concept.Take care of yourself!Salt and pepper are the most common spices.Silver is cheaper than gold.5. It is used in fixed structures : I miss him day after day.Tomorrow morning I have to be on duty.I like to indulge myself with a decadent dessert from time to time.In general they manage to cope with the difficult situations.I assembled it piece by piece.You came just in time for dinner.Keep calm and do things step by step.I looked for help everywhere but nobody reacted.I hope you got your answer….
